column5: I have a jackson big tuna and its a heavy beast so decided to put on  trolling motor.   i've taken it apart and got the speed controller out.  I want to extend the wires to the solo seat position but i'm having a tough time finding some wires.  Where would one get some extra wires?   The minn kota wires don't have any ID number so don't even know how I could match the wire gauge.  Has anyone done a yak mod like this and can provide some advice?
should be able to find the wire match in the owners manual, or online
if you figure it out maybe you can do mine lol i have been looking at the bassyaks motor kits
Once you put a trolling motor on it, it's not a kayak anymore

Once you put a trolling motor on it, it's not a kayak anymore  Ideally, we all would like to have ten different boats in the garage for different situations. But for some of us, me included, that's not an option.
